personalize_card_data.title: Personalized
personalize_card_data.description: Ask us anything travel-related. We gather content from thousands of sources and, based on your unique preferences, we’ll curate experiences that will inspire and excite you.

personalize_card_data.title: Actionable
personalize_card_data.description: In seconds, we provide you with interactive and customizable itineraries that include everything you need for an adventure across the world or in your own backyard.

personalize_card_data.title: All in one place
personalize_card_data.description: Only Mindtrip makes it easy for you to keep track of all of your reservations — transportation, hotels, restaurants and activities — all in one place.

everything_card_data.title: Photos, maps + reviews
everything_card_data.description: Don’t just read about a place; experience it. With vibrant photos, interactive maps and reviews, you’ll feel like you’re already there.

everything_card_data.title: Tailored recommendations
everything_card_data.description: From the best restaurants in your town to the best beaches around the world, we’ve got you covered. Favorite the recommendations you like and add them to your trip plan.

everything_card_data.title: Customizable trip plans
everything_card_data.description: In seconds, we’ll curate customizable itineraries for anywhere you’d like to go. Include specifics in your requests so we can personalize your plans.

everything_card_data.title: Trip sharing
everything_card_data.description: Share your travel plans with friends and family. Publish your itineraries to help inspire other travelers.

organize_it_all_in_one_place: Organize it all in one place.

organize_cards.title: Hotels
organize_cards.description: Stay at the best hotels around the world for the best prices.

organize_cards.title: Car Rental
organize_cards.description: Unlock deals on any type of wheels and hit the road.

organize_cards.title: Flights
organize_cards.description: Get real-time airfares for anywhere you want to jet off to.

organize_cards.title: Restaurants
organize_cards.description: Snag a coveted table at the hottest restaurants.

organize_cards.title: Experiences
organize_cards.description: Make reservations for your favorite activities, then make memories.

organize_cards.title: Tours
organize_cards.description: Get an insider’s perspective on any location or attraction.
